title: Provides appointment process for members of a charter revision commission appointed by the mayor of N.Y. city for the submission of proposals
summary: Provides an appointment process for members of a charter revision commission appointed by the mayor of a city of one million or more inhabitants; establishes qualifications for such members and prohibits certain political contributions by them during their tenure; provides for the manner of submission of certain proposals.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the municipal home rule law, in relation to promoting representative charter revision commissions in cities of one million or more
